Name: Base Station License, Approval, Caribbean Isles Car Service, Inc, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Caribbean Isles Car Service, Inc. also known as Caribbean Isles Car Service Inc. doing business as Tropic Isles Car Service for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Brooklyn.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Caribbean Isles Car Service, Inc. also known as Caribbean Isles Car Service Inc. doing business as Tropic Isles Car Service for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 549 East 26th Street in the borough of Brooklyn is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#3209
